data.title: textDefinition in JS does not saves shadowColor
fix cc.game.config['showFPS'] bug
data.body:
``` javascript
//project.json
{
...
'showFPS' : false,
...
}
```

``` javascript
//CCBoot.js
...
config[CONFIG_KEY.showFPS] = config[CONFIG_KEY.showFPS] || true;// this property will be set to true
...
```

data.title: TVOS JS Binding
data.body:
I see the branch tvos, but is for c++.

When will support tvos to JSBinding?

Thx.

data.title: Fix FadeOutDownTilesTest won't show last tile
3.9 PhysicsBody update() is called twice
data.body:
It's called in PhysicsWorld and ComponentContainer
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/physics/CCPhysicsWorld.cpp#L845
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/2d/CCComponentContainer.cpp#L129

Before the integration of Script Components it was only called in PhysicsWorld, as script components added `scheduleUpdate()` to node's `addComponent()` method

data.title: Research : solving memory model of JSB
data.body:
A proposed solution to use script object life cycle control native object reference counting.

To finally remove retain / release usage in JSB

data.title: Music resumes on power button click after lock
data.body: Test case: Open the game and have the music playing. Lock the phone by pressing the power button. [Music will stop playing upon lock - which is good] Press the power button to turn on the LCD backlight (but do not unlock the phone) Observe that the music starts playing! The issue has been reported here: http://android-developers.blogspot.co.uk/2011/11/making-android-games-that-play-nice.html We were able to re-create the bug on these devices: Kindle HD7 Kindle HD 8.9 Kindle HDX 8.9 (only after changing screen orientation) Nook HD Nook HD+ Suggested solution: Modify the call to onResumeMusic according to: http://android-developers.blogspot.co.uk/2011/11/making-android-games-that-play-nice.html

data.title: __system_property_get is deprecated in 64 bit android NDK
data.body: As discussed here https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=143627, the __system_property_get method has been removed from the 64 bit NDK. It is used in cocos/audio/android/jni/cddandroidAndroidJavaEngine.cpp:59 and should be replaced.

data.title: Multiple definition of `__ctype_get_mb_cur_max'
data.body:
When building for arm64-v8a I get the error "multiple definition of `__ctype_get_mb_cur_max'" during the "install" phase of building for android. The definitions are in:
CCApplication-android.cpp:45
CCEnhanceAPI-android.cpp:35

Removing the repeated definition from CCEnhanceAPI-android.cpp seems to fix it for me.

data.title: Add pageSize param to PageView
data.body:
Previously size of the pages inside pageView were set to fill all pageView, which didn't allow to have ex. more than one page visible on the screen.

Now you can do:

```
pageView->setContentSize(Size(1200,500));
pageView->setPageSize(600);
```

to have 2 pages visible, or `pageView->setPageSize(300)` to have `4`. It works for both HORIZONTAL and VERTICAL.

**If you don't specify pageSize it works as before**.

data.title: Fix typos in documentation
data.body: This PR fixes some minor typos in the documentation comments.
